Ridgeland School District 122 including Simmons Middle School, Ernest F. Kolb Elementary, Harnew Elementary, George W. Lieb Elementary, and Columbus Manor Elementary Schools will be closed next week as a precautionary measure related to COVID-19 (the Corona Virus). Schools will be closed for the next two weeks beginning, Monday, March 16th through Friday, March 27 which includes Spring Break. Expect to hear further information on the reopening of schools.

At this time, we have no suspected or confirmed cases in the district. As this is a situation beyond our control, our priority is the safety of our students, families, and staff. At Home Learning Experiences for students will be posted on the District and Schools Websites to provide educational opportunities during this time off.

Joseph E. Matise

post_text: Students in Ms. Stecich's class are participating in PostCrossing this school year. The class sends a postcard to someone around the world-set up through the PostCrossing community online. Once their postcard has been received, they are eligible to receive a postcard from someone else. So far we have sent postcards to Namibia, Germany, and Russia. We have received postcards from New Zealand, Iceland, and Russia. This is a really fun way for students to learn more about geography and about other cultures around the world. We can't wait to see what country will come up next!
